data.name: Digital Armor Skin Pack | Mall of Mayhem
data.detailed_description:
with the Digital Armor Skin Pack, you can unlock new animated skins that illustrate the digital age with a futuristic look, This pack comes with 3 different variants.

1. The "Digital Blue" Animated Skin
2. The "Digital Red" Animated Skin
3. 1. The "Digital Green" Animated Skin
data.about_the_game:
with the Digital Armor Skin Pack, you can unlock new animated skins that illustrate the digital age with a futuristic look, This pack comes with 3 different variants.

1. The "Digital Blue" Animated Skin
2. The "Digital Red" Animated Skin
3. 1. The "Digital Green" Animated Skin
data.short_description: with the Digital Armor Skin Pack, you can unlock new skins that use digital nanotech.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/ AMD Ryzen 3 or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 / AMD Radeon 7850 or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Please make sure your graphics drivers are up to date
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX 470 or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Please make sure your graphics drivers are up to date
